availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ansel Jackson Moran (Caldwell co. KY, farmer.)

body.p: Smith County, Tennessee, and Caldwell County Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mahala Moran Moran in Wilson County, Tennessee, on September 24, 1844. Father of Joseph Moran, Jane Moran, Elizabeth Moran, Ann Moran, Nancy Moran, Mahala Moran, and Martha L. Moran. Laborer in Smith County in 1850. Farmer in Princeton, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Smith County, South Division, p. 328B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 77.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, District 1, p. 35B.
Tennessee State Marriages, 1780-2002, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Tennessee, Wilson County Marriages, 153.
